title: Interpretation of the oud in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: In the following article, we show you the interpretation of agarwood oil in a dream according to what was interpreted by the great scholar Ibn Sirin. Oud is a good smelling thing that many people love. To perfume yourself with it, or dream of selling it, and ask what this dream means and what it indicates, and in the following article, through an encyclopedia, we show you in detail the interpretation of this dream for a single girl, married and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of oud oil in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said in his book ( Interpretation of dreams) A good stick in a dream indicates praise. Oiling firewood in a dream indicates that the dreamer has good morals and a good reputation among the people. And if the dreamer sees that he is using a rotten stick and drawing it on his body, then this vision indicates that the dreamer falls into sin. Gossiping or swearing to lie. To dream that another person is carrying a stick and anointing with it indicates deception and hypocrisy. One of the most promising dreams is a dream with white wood oil, as this vision indicates that the dreamer will benefit from someone and that God Almighty will provide him with abundant sustenance. Making agarwood oil in a dream is good news for someone who has a vision of success in life. One of the warning visions is a dream of fainting from the beauty of agarwood, and this means that the dreamer is immersed in worldly pleasures and desires, so he should be careful. If one sees in a dream that he is collecting oils in bottles or mixing them With water in a bowl, this dream indicates that he will obtain money without putting any effort into it. Putting wood in clothes in a dream indicates that the dreamer will enjoy worldly pleasures. Interpretation of a dream about an oud in a dream for a single woman. Oiling an oud in a dream for an unmarried person indicates that she A religious girl fears her Lord and avoids sins and transgressions. Seeing agarwood oil in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate the arrival of happy news in her life or that she will be promoted to a greater job. Seeing agarwood oil in a dream for an unmarried girl sometimes indicates the date of her marriage to a religious and wealthy man. And that God Almighty gives her whatever she desires. Seeing the oud in an unmarried girl’s dream means that great wealth will enter her life and that she will obtain a lot of money. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is putting the oud in her clothes, this is a sign that she will acquire knowledge that will benefit her. If An unmarried girl dreamed that she was selling agarwood to people, which means that she was doing good deeds, piety, and helping others. Perfume with agarwood in the unmarried girl’s dream changed her good behavior among people and that there were those who praised her with kind words. Interpretation of agarwood oil in a dream for a married woman: Seeing agarwood in a woman’s dream A married woman indicates the arrival of happy news in her life. This vision can sometimes indicate that this woman will become pregnant soon. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is scented with oud, this means that she is religious, fears God Almighty, and follows the teachings of religion. If a married woman dreams in a dream that she Carrying a bottle of perfume, this indicates the stability of the financial conditions in her life. But if a married woman sees that she is holding a stick on her head in...

title: Interpretation of a factory in a dream Seeing work in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a factory and a factory is for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man or a single man, whether she goes to the workplace and enters the factory, workshop, or shop. Ibn Sirin and others Interpretation of a factory in a dream If you see a factory in a dream, this foretells that you will receive promises and prosperous projects. If you dream of seeing a broken plant, this portends illness and sadness. Dream interpretation of work in a dream Work is one of the places where we spend most of our time after home. Sometimes work in a dream shows a sense of security and stability, and sometimes work in a dream shows tension and responsibility, and we will cover a comprehensive interpretation of the dream of going to work in a dream with its different meanings.Interpretation of work in a dreamInterpretation of going to work in a dreamIf the dreamer sees that he is walking to work, then he will obtain a lot of livelihood, This indicates that he follows Islamic law. But if the dreamer sees that he will work barefoot, this indicates the death of worries and problems that the dreamer suffers from. In the event that he dreams that he will work in a hurry, this indicates the dreamer’s victory over his enemies, and if the dreamer sees that he will work with his head bowed, this indicates However, the dreamer will be freed from illness and will have a long life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. However, if he goes to work in the dream and is retreating, this may indicate that the dreamer has withdrawn from something that occupies his mind, or it may indicate a change in his life, or it may indicate that his religion On the owner of the vision. It is not good. In the event that he goes to work by walking while riding, this may indicate the dreamer’s bad condition. However, if the dreamer sees that he will work while walking proudly, this may indicate the dreamer’s loss in this world and the hereafter, and God knows best. In the event that he goes to work by walking on One leg in a dream, this means that you lose half of the dreamer’s life and money. Interpretation of the workplace in a dream: Seeing a clean workplace in a dream indicates the extent to which the visionary has mastered his work and the sincerity of his efforts to achieve himself at work. If you see cleaning the workplace in a dream, this indicates a change Positive in the dreamer’s life and the dreamer’s attempt to prove himself at work and his attempt to please his superiors at work. If the dreamer feels satisfied with the cleanliness of his workplace, this may indicate that his superiors are satisfied at work, as this may indicate that the dreamer will receive a promotion or reward at work. Interpretation of the chapter From work in a dreamIf the dreamer sees that he was fired from work in a dream, this means that the dreamer is not convinced with what he is doing at work and is not satisfied with his performance at work. He corrects his work performance and performs his duties to the maximum extent so that he is not fired from his job. Interpretation of a promotion at work in a dream. If the dreamer sees that he has been promoted at his job in a dream, this means that his work is acceptable and everyone is satisfied with it. Seeing an administrative position in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be a knowledgeable person. However, if the dreamer sees that he is deprived of a promotion at his work in a dream, this may indicate that he is doing his job without knowing it, and in the event that he sees himself receiving material rewards in a dream, then this may indicate that he is doing his job without knowing it.

title: Interpretation of chewing gum in a dream: Seeing gum in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of chewing gum or chewing gum for a pregnant woman is for divorced women, whether she buys food in the mouth and pours it into the mouth with saliva, according to Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Interpretation of chewing gum in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is chewing and then commits immorality, and this is the work of the people of Lot. Incense: It is like a medicine for whoever eats it. Eating gum, frankincense is like some medicine. If he sees that he is chewing gum and frankincense, then the matter becomes a lot of talking and repetition, as a dispute, a complaint, or the like. Chewing gum in a dream by Ibn Shirin. Whoever sees that he is chewing it will get money in a dispute. It was said that chewing gum is an immoral act because it is the work of the people of Lot. Interpretation of chewing gum in a dream. If a person sees in his dream that he is taking gum from someone, then this dream may indicate his serious suffering from sorrows, worries and problems, while seeing gum may indicate gossip and gossip. . He goes through all the crises and difficult consequences. Explaining gum by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing gum in a dream, this vision may indicate that the viewer is exposed to worries, problems, heartaches, and difficult judgments, and it often indicates failure and severe suffering from poverty and losing a lot of money. If you dream of getting rid of gum and throwing it away A single girl who sees in her dream that she is chewing gum, this dream may indicate the difficulty of achieving all the desires she wants. Achieving it, while seeing the disposal of gum may indicate an improvement in its condition. For better and better, while seeing gum sticking to clothes can indicate that there are people surrounding her who are hateful, jealous and evil and want to ruin her life. Interpretation of chewing gum in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees gum in her dream may indicate the presence of many marital disputes and these problems lead to separation or separation. Divorce, while seeing chewing gum may indicate that she is exposed to worries, problems, and heartaches. And if she sees that she is getting rid of the gum, this may indicate that she is pregnant soon, and she will get rid of all the worries, problems, and sorrows that she faces, and her marital life will stabilize. Interpretation of chewing gum in a dream for a woman Pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is chewing gum, this vision may indicate that she is suffering from severe pain during pregnancy, and this vision is a warning to her that her fetus will suffer from many health problems during the birth process. Seeing gums falling out may indicate an easy and accurate birth without problems, and she and her baby will be healthy. Dream Interpretation: YouTube Gum

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a patient I know in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone I know sick in a dream: Illness is considered one of the most dangerous experiences that a person goes through, but it is also a test and experiment by the Creator to distinguish between His loyal servants, and seeing a person suffering is painful for the soul, especially if it is for the sake of a close or beloved person, so the interpretation of seeing a person suffering is painful for the soul, especially if it is for the sake of a close or beloved person. Someone you know is sick in a dream has many meanings and interpretations, including good and scary, which instills panic in souls. What is the interpretation of seeing someone I know sick in a dream? This vision basically expresses the presence of a dear friend facing a dilemma or a major problem that is difficult to get out of safely. It also expresses that the visionary himself is exposed to a difficult crisis for which he cannot find a suitable solution. It also indicates the presence of a material substance that controls the life of the viewer, and perhaps the substance is the main driver in his daily dealings with humans, as he always seeks a financial return. If the disease succeeds in If he is injured because he is no longer able to move or speak, this indicates that this person’s behavior and morals have changed seriously and he may distance himself from all his acquaintances and friends and denounce them. Some interpreters also say that it shows that the dreamer is in good health and free from the diseases that he is thinking about, as He cares about his physical condition and health. But it can also express the worsening situation in the past period and the increase in problems and differences, as it indicates the worsening of events and the difficulty of finding a way out. As for fighting the disease and receiving various treatments, this expresses a strong and strong-willed personality that hates making those around it feel weak. And incapacity. Interpretation of seeing a sick person I know in a dream by Ibn Sirin: If the illness is psychological, it is evidence of this friend’s suffering and going through a difficult psychological state, which may lead him to a stage of depression and isolation. As for an organic illness accompanied by pain, it indicates the loss of a loved one or the loss of something of value. Great for the dreamer himself. If the disease is chronic or persistent, this indicates that the dreamer will find another job or change his current place of work to a better place that provides him with more profits. But skin disease expresses entering into a financial crisis, due to the loss of a lot of money and property. There are several factors that control arriving at an accurate interpretation of this vision, such as: the nature of the relationship between the patient and the dreamer, the type of illness he suffers from, as well as the behavior of the dreamer. A disease that causes a rash or affects the skin, indicates the bad reputation of the one he proposes to in the last days. But if he sees the person he loves in reality often causing itching on his skin, this indicates that God will provide him with abundant provisions and allow him to marry her. If the girl is sick, this indicates that she will not be happy with the marriage she is about to enter into, and it may cause her many problems. If he visits him and visits him to help him recover, this indicates the great love and feelings that you have for this person and the desire to sacrifice for him. .While

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pillow in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pillow in a dream: To see a pillow in a man’s and a woman’s dreams interprets security and tranquility, and perhaps sleeping on a pillow in a dream is a good offspring that the pioneer will soon acquire, and in a woman’s dream there is psychological and familial stability and tranquility. God’s command in some places to see large pillows indicates a state of tolerance with him and good luck. Happy, as dream scholars see that there are many places where the pillow interprets fear of the future and anxiety, and the white color in the pillow as a sign of a high position and a new job to receive the master, and in the dream of married and unmarried people. Interpretation of a dream about a pillow in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that the pillow in a dream It indicates great scholars. He also said that a pillow in a dream is a symbol of children for married men and women. Seeing a large pillow indicates that it indicates great wealth and good luck. Anyone who dreams of buying a new pillow indicates that he is thinking about marriage. As for seeing a bad pillow, it indicates... Bad luck and fatigue. Interpretation of a dream about a pillow in a dream for one girl. A single girl who dreams that she buys a new pillow in a dream is an indication of the strength and cleanliness of the relationship between her and her friend. Whoever sees that there is a pillow for her as a gift in a dream shows her kindness and compassionate living. As for the one who dreams that she is washing A pillow in a dream is an indication that her engagement date is approaching. Dreaming about losing a pillow in a dream symbolizes the appearance of fatigue as a result of problems. When she sees herself shopping for a pillow in a dream, this means that she has wronged someone, but without intention. Seeing a white pillow is a sign of his good reputation. A pink pillow indicates kindness and joy. Anyone who sees a silk pillow symbolizes her marriage to a rich man. Seeing a pillow made of wool indicates closeness to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about a pillow in a dream for a married woman. A pillow in a dream for a married woman has a beautiful appearance. It indicates To the birth of girls and boys. The blue pillow in her dream symbolizes goodness and food. The green pillow indicates that she is traveling with her husband to another country. The pillow is white in color, which indicates the love and honesty of her husband. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pillow for a divorced woman. White pillows are a sign of joy, happiness, and purity of the self. Calmness, peace of mind, and the disappearance of fears and sorrows. Seeing old and worn pillows is a sign of stress and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pillow for a pregnant woman. A white and pink pillow on a pregnant woman indicates the birth of a woman. As for a blue or brown pillow, it indicates a male child. Seeing two pillows indicates the birth of twins. Interpretation Dream of seeing a pillow for a man. Pillows may indicate children or scholars. A pillow may indicate a wife. A white pillow may indicate a virgin woman and a red pillow may indicate a previously married woman, or both pillows may indicate a daughter or a wife in his bond. Large pillows can indicate wealth and wealth. Buying a pillow for a young man is evidence of his imminent marriage. A white pillow in a dream A white pillow in a dream is a source of plentiful and plentiful livelihood. By God's will, he sleeps

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a married woman’s watch?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch for a married woman may refer to her psychological state, which some interpreters said coincides with the state of this watch, and whether it is disciplined or has a certain flaw that makes it inaccurate. Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch for a married woman. What is the interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch for a married woman? Seeing a woman wearing a watch and wanting to know the time accurately is evidence of her organized and organized personality, which makes her capable of managing all matters of her personal and family life. But if she sees that she has moved forward Or she is a few minutes late, then she may miss a great opportunity or be a reason for her husband to miss her because of her great relationship with him, especially if she got a job offer abroad and her opinion was not there. Traveling because she could not stay away from him, but she later regretted missing this opportunity. If she sees that she is carrying an old watch, there are memories inside her that she cannot forget or get rid of. Seeing the husband giving her one and accepting it with joy indicates her place in the husband’s heart and his continuous work to provide happiness and stability for his wife And his children. But if she does not have children and has a strong desire to have a child to fill the void that she lives in all the time, a beautiful and disciplined watch is a good sign that she will have a beautiful child very soon, but then follow up the situation with an expert doctor and receive the reasons. It was said in The interpretation of this dream is that it is a reflection of a woman’s constant sense of responsibility, which may sometimes exceed her ability, but she still resists and adapts so as not to fall short of anyone. The wristwatch was not known in the time of Imam Ibn Sirin, but we have come up with interpretations that the Imam said that it is somewhat close to seeing the watch that symbolizes time and interest in it. Whoever sees that she wants to know her exact time He carries out her duties and does not postpone anything or leave anything to chance. She plans and organizes everything in her life and in the lives of her children and husband. It may also indicate her religious commitment and her desire to perform prayers on time without delay. If a woman abandons her habit of knowing the timing accurately, it is not A good indication that she has begun to neglect the rights of her husband and children, if any, a kind of indifference that could lead to the loss of her family’s stability. title: Interpretation of vinegar in a dream: pickles, pickles, crushed vinegar in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of vinegar, if white apple cider vinegar is poured is black tarshi vinegar, drinking from a bottle of vinegar for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, according to Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of vinegar in a dream Vinegar in a dream means wealth with reverence, blessings, long life and lack of pleasure, and happiness for the one who eats it with bread, and whoever eats it, money falls from it. It is of little benefit with weakness, and its vinegar and drunkenness are present and frightening. It has been said: What was originally vinegar indicates sustenance and blessing, and vinegar indicates jihad, toil, and effort. Vinegar can indicate a flaw in a woman, child, or work, and perhaps it indicates safety from fear and ward off harm and enemies, and perhaps it indicates worship and patience in hardships. Perhaps vinegar refers to vinegar, which is a friend. Vinegar indicates wealth, blessings and a long life, and whoever sees himself drinking vinegar, he shows hostility towards his family. Vinegar is a legitimate food, and for whoever searches for the matter, the goal will be achieved, and the contract will be annulled because of the origin of its name, especially for the one who used it or combined it. If you drink vinegar. In a dream, it means that you are anxious and pessimistic about implementing and completing some concerns that will cause you anxiety. And if you use vinegar on the table, it means that problems will escalate into issues that you do not agree with others. Seeing vinegar in a dream is always a bad omen in forms and situations. Different. And to dream that you are buying or selling vinegar in a dream, and that people are also participating in it, this is a sign of hearing unpleasant news. Interpretation of drinking vinegar in a dreamDrinking vinegar in a dream is a warning of illness for about two days, a mild or minor illness, provided that it is If a married woman drinks vinegar in her dream, she will gain fame and value as much as she drank. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is drinking vinegar, she will bid farewell to her loved one before giving birth. If she sees an unmarried woman under the age of twenty She herself drinks vinegar, then she will marry a man who will be the cause of her unhappiness. And whoever sees that he is drinking vinegar, this is evidence of the enmity of his household, and this is due to the shrinking of the mouth. And a prisoner drinking vinegar is evidence of salvation. Interpretation of white vinegar in a dream. Ibn Sirin says: If the fortuneteller sees vinegar in his dream, this indicates An increase in livelihood and indicates that the monarch will achieve many of the goals he seeks. However, if a person is suffering from an illness and sees white vinegar, this means that he will. Free from diseases and the beginning of a new life. If a prisoner sees that he is drinking white vinegar, this vision means that he will soon be released from prison and released from prison. However, if the vinegar has many impurities and its color is not clear, then this vision means that the person who sees it is suffering from problems Many in his love life and indicates marital problems. But if you see yourself eating vinegar with bread, this means getting rid of severe anxiety and this means that you are suffering from many problems in your life and you are suffering from financial difficulties, but they will be resolved soon. Interpretation of vinegar in a dream for a single woman says Imam Nabulsi: If a girl sees in her dream pure white vinegar without impurities, then this vision indicates that she has heard a lot

title: Interpretation of a maid in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Meaning and interpretation of seeing a maid in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a maid in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a worker in a dream. Although dreams are a group of unrealistic scenes that a person is exposed to at night during his sleep, and which may last only a few minutes, they convey many things between their events that tell us what the future holds. From dreams. Mirror. For human life and future, many seek to interpret their dreams and find out their meaning. Despite the point of view of psychology that dreams are nothing but visual scenes made by the human mind as a result of its response to a certain stimulus or incentive, or they are an internal means of expressing the inner needs and desires of an individual, which he may fear. . To succeed in reality for fear of social controls or limiting the boundaries of reality, but the science of dream interpretation is an ancient science that predates the existence of man on earth, and the Muslim scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin was one of the most prominent Muslim dream interpreters who left us the book “The Great Interpretation of Dreams,” which is still... A reference for people in interpreting their dreams to this day. Therefore, today we show you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about seeing a maid for a single, married, pregnant, and divorced man from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of the maid in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin showed that when a man dreams of buying a servant, this is evidence that he is expanding his business. And his works, increases his sources of livelihood, and enjoys lawful money, just as he has a servant or maid in a house. The dream is a sign that the dreamer is earning a sum of money. As for the one who dreams that he intends to buy a maid, this means that he will work in the field of trade. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is selling his maid, this dream indicates that he is suffering from poverty and destitution in reality. Also, seeing Marrying a maid indicates sincerity of intention, the uprightness of religious conditions, and gaining a lot of livelihood and kindness. Seeing a maid in a poor man’s dream also indicates that he will become wealthy in the future. Seeing a maid with her back bare or some parts of her body indicates the spread of the dreamer’s news and knowledge of a lot. Of people about her, while seeing a maid wearing clothes and a hidden body means that you will. We will hear good news and happy events soon, God willing. While when a man dreams of an emotional or emotional relationship with one of the maids, this indicates that he has committed a major sin that will complicate the affairs of his life. A lazy maid in a dream indicates sadness and anguish. Whoever sees in his dream a maid with a frowning face, Seeing it indicates that he will hear news that saddens him. The symbol of the maid in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream a beautiful nation and is suffering from poverty in reality, his vision suggests that God will enrich him soon. Among the noble dreams is the dream of the presence of a maid in a man’s bedroom, as it is a sign that the dreamer is committing behavior Bad. If one sees in his dream that he is confessing his love to the maid, this means that he will face ridicule and ridicule from those around him. To dream of escaping from the maid means that the dreamer will hear sad news and this dream may indicate that the dreamer has lost his money. When one sees the nakedness of the maid in his dream This means that he will suffer from...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black mobile phone for a divorced woman

preview.html: Through the website gptafser.com/ we will learn about this topic and all the illustrative cases of seeing a mobile phone in a dream, in addition to a detailed explanation of the dream of a black mobile phone, so stay with us. Interpretation of a dream about a black mobile phone for a divorced woman. It is considered one of the unwanted visions for women and men in general, and it contains sad news and a lot of anxiety. And sadness. Finding a big black cell phone in a dream is a sign of a great misfortune in the dreamer’s life. A talking black cell phone in a divorced woman’s dream indicates an attractive and handsome man, but strong and cooperative. Talking on a black cell phone in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will face Difficulties and problems in the coming period. Making a call from a black cell phone in a dream means successive failures and disappointments, and God knows best. Whoever receives a call from a black cell phone in a dream will hear disturbing news in the coming days. It is said that selling or crashing a black phone in a dream is good news for getting rid of From worries and heartaches, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a mobile phone for individuals is one of the positive visions, foretelling a noticeable improvement in their living conditions soon. Buying a new mobile phone is the fulfillment of a desire that cannot be fulfilled. Breaking a mobile phone is a sign of the end of a romantic relationship. In her life. Finding an old cell phone in a dream is evidence that the girl will return to a previous relationship in her life and later regret this act. See also: The meaning of seeing a mobile phone, cell phone, or telephone in a dream. Interpretation of tracking a mobile phone in a dream for a married womanIn a woman’s dream For a married woman, a mobile phone symbolizes radical changes in her life and she may move to a new home. An old mobile phone in a married woman’s dream shows the dreamer meeting her old friends and talking about memories. If the dreamer puts a secret number on her phone in a dream, she does not accept someone’s interference in her life and privacy. Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream about a man and its meaning. Interpretation scholars say that a mobile phone in a man’s dream is evidence of achieving goals and objectives and a change in circumstances for the better. A modern mobile phone in a man’s dream is interpreted as many tasks and tasks assigned to him at work. Phone calls in a dream are a sign. To pass on conversations between people and hear unconfirmed news, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing a mobile phone in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A phone call in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she knows the sex of the fetus. A new cell phone was born in a dream, and God knows best. If the pregnant woman saw that the doctor was speaking With her on the cell phone. She must take care of her health and the health of her fetus and adhere to medications and a healthy diet. Seeing a mobile phone in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates new changes in her life. Starting from the birth of the baby to the week’s ceremonies and caring for the child. Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream for young people and its meaning. Commentators have indicated The mobile phone in the dream of young people is good news and optimism that the future is better, God willing

title: Secrets of interpreting the court in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaning in all cases

preview.html: In the following article, the encyclopedia gives you an interpretation of seeing a court in a dream. It is one of those uncommon visions, or that many of us have had during our sleep, as it cannot be said that all people, men and women, have ever entered a court, whether they have the right He seeks to obtain it. A person or he is a competitor and enemy to others, which is his right. This dream is given to one of these people, because for them it represents a strange topic that they want to understand its interpretation and understand the messages that it conveys to them. The court is the house of justice, and the judiciary resorts to those who have lost their right to try to recover it, and every guilty person is punished, and for this reason the dream comes after various cases that he may see in it. , such as seeing the lawyer trying to come to the accused for acquittal, to see leaving or entering the court, the dream interpretation of a complaint or gaining innocence and other interpretations of this dream that we will present to the details in the following paragraphs, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the court in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Below is the interpretation of seeing the court in The dream as narrated by the scholar Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing the court in the dark indicates justice and the dreamer’s urgent desire to establish justice and achieve equality between himself and those around him and those who deal with him. Seeing the court in a dream means that the dreamer is about to make important decisions related to his future. Whether in his personal or professional life, he must be careful about it and think about it carefully. Seeing the dreamer standing in the testing cage, accused and unable to defend himself and prove his innocence, indicates that the dreamer has committed a sin that he knows very well that he has committed, and this dream shows a feeling of remorse. And his desire. To repent. Entering the court in a dream and the dreamer knowing that he will be tried before a judge indicates that he will be exposed to some difficulties and judgments that will make him go through anxiety and thought, and God knows best. The court in a dream and the dreamer being accused in it indicates that he suffered from feelings of anxiety and terror as a result of the fears that haunt him in waking life, which He cannot get rid of them, which the subconscious mind translates to him in the form of dreams. Interpretation of the courtroom in a dream If the dreamer sees in a dream that the courtroom in a dream is full of attendees, then this is a sign of kindness and the appearance of pleasant events for the dreamer. As for the court being empty of attendance and causing fear, this is a sign of Injustice to its owner. If the dreamer sees himself in an empty courtroom and sees a judge in the dream, this indicates the dreamer’s victory over those who wronged him, but in the case of a dream about a representative, this indicates that he is accused of an illegal case. Interpretation of a court note in a dreamIn case the dreamer sees a court note In a dream, the meaning of this lies in the great effort made by the dreamer to complete his dealings with government agencies. Dreaming of a court memorandum also indicates the dreamer’s desire to obtain official approval from a government agency regarding something in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of the plaintiff’s vision In a dreamWhen you see a prosecutor in court in a dream, the meaning of this dream lies in the pursuit of the visionary
